items.title: United Airlines adds flights in case Spirit fails
items.description: United Airlines will add two new routes and beef up schedules on more than 15 others.

items.title: JetBlue to upgrade Wi-Fi with fast new Amazon-powered satellite service
items.description: JetBlue is upgrading its on-board internet with the help of satellites from Amazon.

items.title: Spirit Airlines axes 11 cities from route map as bankruptcy cuts begin
items.description: Spirit Airlines will cut 11 cities from its route map as part of its latest Chapter 11 bankruptcy restruturing.

items.title: How I transitioned from cash-back rewards to my points and miles card strategy

items.title: How to redeem Marriott Bonvoy points for maximum value
items.description: Explore the various ways to use and maximize your Marriott points, such as on hotel reservations, flights and purchases through shopping portals.
